title: Riot better make the ping muted
body: i played with some fuking trollers in game, they get banned chatting, those shiit keep pinging whole time, even we muted him on chat. why riot doesnt make it mute as the chat? those harasser they make this game so annoying.

replies.body:
This is something we have considered implementing in the past, but I have no new information on whether it is currently being worked on or even planned for the future.

If they were routinely obnoxious about this, make sure to report them after the game!  If they are consistently ruining gaming experiences, then they will face further punishment.
